moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Persistent EXE Payload Installer
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This Module will upload an executable to a remote host and make it Persistent.
                            It can be installed as USER, SYSTEM, or SERVICE. USER will start on user login,
                            SYSTEM will start on system boot but requires privs. SERVICE will create a new service
                            which will start the payload. Again requires privs.
author: Merlyn drforbin Cousins <drforbin6@gmail.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: STARTUP
options.description: Startup type for the persistent payload. (Accepted: USER, SYSTEM, SERVICE)

options.name: REXEPATH
options.description: The remote executable to upload and execute.

options.name: REXENAME
options.description: The name to call exe on remote system

options.name: LocalExePath
options.description: The local exe path to run. Use temp directory as default.

options.name: StartupName
options.description: The name of service or registry. Random string as default.

options.name: ServiceDescription
options.description: The description of service. Random string as default.
